text: Daniel Edward Antonucci (born February 27, 1957) is a Canadian animator, director, producer and writer. Antonucci is known for creating the Cartoon Network animated comedy series Ed, Edd n Eddy. He also created Lupo the Butcher, Cartoon Sushi and The Brothers Grunt. ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Toronto Category:Canadian animators
title: Danny Antonucci
